mapper.select: SELECT id productId, category_id, IFNULL(place_id, 0), title, content, price, read_count, order_status, create_at FROM product

SELECT p.id productId, u.id userId, u.nickname, p.category_id, IFNULL(place_id, 0), p.title, p.content, p.price, p.read_count, p.order_status, p.create_ats FROM product p INNER JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET user_id = #{userId}, category_id = #{categoryId}, place_id = #{placeId}, name = #{name}, content = #{content}, price = #{price}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, del_yn = #{delYn}, delete_at = #{deleteAt}, update_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (user_id, category_id, place_id, name, content, price, read_count, order_status, del_yn, create_at) VALUES(#{userId},#{categoryId},#{placeId},#{name},#{content}, #{price},0,"wait","N",NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.category_id, p.place_id, p.name, p.content, p.price, p.read_count, p.order_status, p.create_at, p.update_at, p.delete_at, p.del_yn, CONCAT("/upload/",f.name) AS file_path FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_images i ON p.id = i.product_id LEFT JOIN files f ON i.product_image_id = f.id WHERE p.user_id = #{id} AND i.thumbnail = "Y" AND p.del_yn = "N"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_images (product_id, product_image_id, thumbnail) VALUES (#{productId},#{productImageId},#{thumbnail})
